title: Privacy policy | KROCK.IO
content:
THIS PRIVACY POLICY IS AN INTEGRAL PART OF THE PUBLIC AGREEMENT (TERMS OF USE) BETWEEN KROCK.IO SERVICE AND THE USER. YOU ARE REQUIRED TO READ THIS PRIVACY POLICY TO HAVE A POSSIBILITY TO USE KROCK.IO SERVICE. IF YOU REGISTER AN ACCOUNT OR USE KROCK.IO SERVICE, IT IS AUTOMATICALLY DEEMED THAT YOU ACCEPTED THE TERMS OF THIS PRIVACY POLICY.

We may apply changes to this Policy from time to time so please review it regularly. This Policy was last updated on 24 Aug 2019. If you have any questions about this Policy please contact us at legal@krock.io

Collection, processing and use of data that You (hereinafter referred to as “User” /”You”) provided during the use of the KROCK.IO service (hereinafter referred to as “Service” / “KROCK.IO Service “/ “We”) is performed exclusively in accordance with international treaties and the current legislation of Ukraine.

BY USING THE SERVICE, YOU WILL BE DEEMED TO HAVE AGREED TO THIS POLICY, SO IF YOU DO NOT AGREE, PLEASE DO NOT USE THE SERVICE.

Types of data that may be collected, processed and used during your use of the Service.

Which information do we collect?

How We use information for marketing purposes

We may send you marketing emails about products or services which are related to the Service or contact You by email with information about the Service. We will not send You any other marketing emails or pass Your information on to third parties unless You give your consent or You have given it already.

How long do We store collected information

The collected information is kept for the time necessary to provide the service(s) requested by You. You can request for the collected information to be removed.

Our Commitment to Security

The Service employs appropriate technical and organizational security measures to prevent unauthorized access to information We collect online.

AI tokens purchased through our service have an expiration date. These tokens will expire 12 months after the date of purchase. This expiration policy applies to all AI tokens, regardless of the quantity purchased or the specific use case.

Additional documentation:

Harju maakond, Kristiine linnaosa, A. H. Tammsaare tee 47

Harju maakond, Kristiine linnaosa, A. H. Tammsaare tee 47
